sentences.english: The centuries-old Qilu culture has nurtured this vast fertile land.
sentences.chinese: 数千年的齐鲁文化滋润着这片广饶沃土。

sentences.english: Among these "Qilu Evening News" Community News is one of the representatives.
sentences.chinese: 这其中《齐鲁晚报》的社区新闻是其中的代表。

sentences.english: Institute of beautiful environment, is Qilu Petrochemical Company and civilized unit.

sentences.english: His Art of War has been passed down to this day. Qilu culture has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 《孙子兵法》流传至今，齐鲁文化源远流长。

sentences.english: VI This part puts forward the implementation measures of staff stimulation in Qilu Petroleum and Chemical Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 第六部分提出了齐鲁石化公司员工化激励的实施对策。

sentences.english: Chapter IV introduced the "Qilu Evening News" community news layout planning.
sentences.chinese: 第四章介绍了《齐鲁晚报》社区新闻的版面策划。

sentences.english: Coal Mine, the pear of Shandong Province, will be shining with even more dazzling glories.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿这颗齐鲁明珠必将绽放更加耀眼夺目的光彩。

sentences.english: Recombinant human granulocyte stimulating factor (GSF) was bought from Qilu Pharmacy Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 重组人粒细胞刺激因子购于齐鲁制药有限公司。

sentences.english: Finally, the analysis "Qilu Evening News" community news of a news event planning.
sentences.chinese: 最后，分析《齐鲁晚报》社区新闻的新闻事件策划。

sentences.english: The product applied in SINOPEC Qilu Company and SINOPEC Yangzi Petrochemical Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 该材料在齐鲁石化和扬子石化分别进行了应用。

sentences.english: Qilu culture had a profound influence on the poetry theory of shandong's three famous poets.
sentences.chinese: 齐鲁文化对“山左三家”诗论有深刻的影响。

sentences.english: The Qi-Lu parties set the battlefield in Chang Shao.
sentences.chinese: 齐鲁双方把战场设在了长勺。

sentences.english: Based Qilu, famed Jiuzhou is our goal.
sentences.chinese: 立足齐鲁，誉满九洲，是我们的目标。

sentences.english: The modifications of caustic soda facility and production techniques of chlor-alkali plant of Qilu Petrochemical Inc. are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 总结了齐鲁氯碱厂烧碱装置及生产技术的改进。

sentences.english: Even in early Spring and Autumn Period, the old Lu style of cooking was rather developed.
sentences.chinese: 早在春秋时期，古齐鲁的烹饪技术就比较发达。
